      • Level

        protected Level(int width,
                int height,
                int balance,
                java.lang.String fileName)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a level
        Parameters:
        width - The width in spots, of the level
        height - The height in spots, of the level
        balance - The player's starting sun balance
        fileName - The file storing the level's zombie data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If readline fails
